sections.general:
ADVOCATE
Professional Summary
Conscientious attorney with experience in government relations, educational law and advocacy for families with special needs children, two years
practice in health law and public policy for military families, two years federal government experience in human rights and foreign affairs with the
U.S. Department of State
Core Qualifications
KEY QUALIFICATIONS
Government Relations
Special Education Law
Member of Maryland Bar
Health Law
Statutory Public Policy
Statutory Procedure
Foreign Affairs
Multi-task management
Human Rights Law Diplomacy
